Wanted to play the game since year 2 or 3 but was afraid of it dying. Still going strong with 5 years and bought it cause I was a fan of RE2. Leon looks hot,Jill is alright, claire is absolutely duckface ugly, redfield looks alright. But there's waifus in all shape and sizes for your taste while dying. Playerbase is toxic if you're in low rank(I'm in blue/red). People will do dumb stuff like never hold M1 and will let you die for hatch. But fun game to play alone or with friends.
P.S nobody cares about rank, it's more fun in lower rank anyway when you can run around and do nothing but still win.

Dead by Daylight is a 4v1 Multiplayer horrorgame where 1 killer has to hunt down 4 survivors and prevent them from escaping.
as survivor you can go into a game alone, but also with friends, personally the game is much more fun with friends since the randoms are better of playing a different game xD.
After gathering a LOT of content, the grind in DbD will be huge aswell, so if youre a grinder, get ready for a few sleepless nights, otherwise if youre just playing it for fun, try to make it fun for yourself and others aswell :)

o jogo é divertido, porem o filo das Neas player deixa o jogo um pouco toxico, são conhecidas por 

começam a rodar em volta do loop, roda roda roda roda roda roda roda roda roda roda paletada + flash light, tbag (5x) + macro click na lanterna, corre pra outro loop, leva hit pulando a janela, flash light click, corre pra outro loop, roda roda roda roda roda roda roda em volta do loop, paletada, teabag(25x) vai pra dead zone, da cinco 360° e no final cai...(disconnect)

Das Spiel an sich macht schon Spaß. Allerdings ist die Balance zwischen Killer und Survivor absolut grotten schlecht. Man hat als Überlebender so gut wie keine Chance eine Runde zu gewinnen es sei denn der Killer ist lost.

Hoy en día es el multijugador asimétrico por excelencia y la verdad que se lo merece bastante.

Tiene la "mala fama" de tener una comunidad tóxica en elos altos (cosa que aún no llegué), pero al menos en donde estoy no me suelo encontrar con muuuchos trolls o gente tóxica.

Si lo encontrás barato dale una oportunidad, y si estás con amigos mejor que mejor!

DO NOT buy this game. I regret spending money buying this game, and I tremendously regret buying this game as a gift for my cousin. If you happen to to have purchased this game and participated in any event, don't bother using the sacrificial items especially for the bloodpoints. Nobody deserves your hard earned cakes or party streamer. Better spend your money somewhere else. 

This game is filled with the absolute degenerate, scummiest killer player on the whole entire planet. Tunnel, tunnel, camp, tunnel, tunnel, camp. Oh did I forget to mention tunnel?

Before you post any comments, I have 400 hours on this game. Also rank 4 on both survivors and killers.

This is easily my favorite game, normally balanced but there are some perks that make some things broken in the game. I have put 400 hours into this on console and restarted on pc so it's an awesome game, great killers from great franchises, same with survivors, awesome concept like no other game, and normally great gameplay, if you are new it will take a bit to get used to but once you start to figure some stuff out this game is something that you can't get bored of with the amount of variety in the game as well, from different killers, survivors, and perks and add-ons every game is different which makes this game very fun. Epic Gamer Game.

Так.... Начнем с плюсов... игра хорошая, 4 выживших 1 маньяк. Задачи выживших починить 5 генераторов на карте, всего их 7. Задача маньяка поймать всех выживших и не дать починить все генераторы, все просто! 
Так же в игре есть очень много интересных персонажей, из фильмов и игр. Это относится как сурвам так и к манам.
Есть огромное количество перков и улучшений. 
В игре можно надевать персонажей в разную одежду. Так же в игре проходят разные обновления, в которых добавляют новых персонажей, карты и улучшения. 
Теперь начнем с минусов игры...

如果有朋友问我这款这游戏如何，我一定会说你看看就行，我不建议他买。
这个游戏连平衡都做不到，为了大多数人，把生存者和杀手设计的前者无论技能还是地图优势远远大于后者，4个人组队能够开麦，把杀手玩的团团转。
刚刚玩了一张图4分钟人类下了6块板子，一个为了利益连公平都做不到的游戏我的良心不允许我把他分享给其他人。
大多数人玩屠夫不会像主播一样意识优秀，擅长博弈，玩个走地屠夫一局偶尔失误一两下整局的节奏就丢了，开局两分钟挂了个人，就因为空了两刀亮了两台机，你说是段位高吗，不是，回归玩家这赛季第三把。
如果你们玩了屠夫，就一定能了解现状，感受到不同类型的屠夫无力。
玩这游戏的没有多少菜鸟，你如果想关照他们就请开个绿色服，然后调整一下游戏平衡，慢慢的你就会知道你不改变才会真的失去。
可能这游戏我除了想起来不会再带你进来看了，你们调整也好摆烂也行，只是个游戏，有很多好游戏等着我们去发现，评论区的各位没必要因为这么个游戏气愤，开心才重要，如果这个游戏不能给你带来愉快体验不玩也罢。
怎么一直匹配不到屠夫？？晚上和我朋友四个人，足足等了那么久就配不到人，能不能修复一下？
